name: Phase Shifter
description: This algorithm is based on the Phase Shifter algorithm from the disting mk4. It generates two outputs in a fixed phase relationship to each other, designed for mathematical accuracy and capable of producing interesting psycho-acoustic effects or swooshy sounds. Unlike the Phaser algorithm, it focuses on precise phase shifting rather than creating sweeping sound effects.
gui_description: The interface includes controls for setting the phase shift amount, wet/dry mix, and output level. It also features routing options to specify input/output buses and select between Add/Replace modes for outputs.

parameters.name: Shift_input
parameters.description: The bus to use for the phase shift CV, scaled as 5V per 360°.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of buses to process, starting from the Input. For example, for a stereo signal, set this to 2.

parameters.name: Unshifted_output
parameters.description: The bus to use for the unshifted output signal. Note that this is not the same as the dry signal unless the input is a pure sine wave.

parameters.name: Unshifted_mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector for the unshifted output.

parameters.name: +ve_shift_output
parameters.description: The bus to use for the positive shifted output.

parameters.name: +ve_shift_mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector for the positive shifted output.

parameters.name: -ve_shift_output
parameters.description: The bus to use for the negative shifted output.

parameters.name: -ve_shift_mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector for the negative shifted output.

input_ports.name: Shift_input
input_ports.description: CV input bus controlling phase shift amount (scaled as 5V per 360°).

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: Audio input bus for the signal to be processed.

output_ports.name: Unshifted_output
output_ports.description: Output of the unshifted audio signal (not identical to dry unless input is a pure sine wave).

output_ports.name: +ve_shift_output
output_ports.description: Output of the positively phase-shifted audio signal.

output_ports.name: -ve_shift_output
output_ports.description: Output of the negatively phase-shifted audio signal.
